name: Crack Burgers with Mashed Potatoes & Broccoli
description: Flavor-packed burgers with ranch, bacon, and cheddar, served alongside creamy mashed potatoes and roasted broccoli.
instructions: Prepare Burger Patties: In a large bowl, combine ground chuck, sour cream, ranch mix, crumbled bacon, and cheddar. Mix gently. Form into 5 equal patties.
Cook Burgers: Preheat grill or skillet (medium-high). Cook patties 4-5 minutes per side or to desired doneness. Keep warm.
Cook Potatoes: Place peeled, chunked potatoes in a pot, cover with cold salted water. Boil, then simmer until tender (15-20 min).
Mash Potatoes: Drain cooked potatoes. Return to pot. Add warm cream, melted butter, garlic powder, onion powder. Mash until smooth. Season with salt & pepper.
Roast Broccoli: Preheat oven to 425°F (220°C). Toss broccoli florets with olive oil, optional red pepper flakes, salt, pepper. Spread on a parchment-lined baking sheet.
Roast Broccoli (cont.): Roast for 15-20 minutes until tender-crisp and slightly charred.
Serve: Plate one burger patty with mashed potatoes and roasted broccoli.
